faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Click a question to reveal the answer.

items.question: Do I need to be an official member?
items.answer: No. The community is open. You can start by joining activities and meeting people.

items.question: Which language is used?
items.answer: Mostly Indonesian, with flexibility for DE/EN when needed.

items.question: Are activities online or offline?
items.answer: Both. Kajian may run online/offline, while social gatherings are usually in person.

items.question: When does kajian usually happen?
items.answer: Usually in the evening or on weekends. Schedules are shared regularly in the main channel.

items.question: Can I bring my family?
items.answer: Yes, especially for silaturrahim, iftar, and halal bihalal events.

items.question: How can I help?
items.answer: Tell the admin your interest; any support is valuable, from logistics to communications.
